mutants.original_line: rearranged = [i if i in d else 0 for i in range(N)]
mutants.mutated_line: rearranged = [i if i not in d else 0 for i in range(N)]
mutants.code:
def rearrange_array(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (N, arr) in test_cases:
        d = set(arr)
        rearranged = [i if i not in d else 0 for i in range(N)]
        results.append(rearranged)
    return results
